title: Luke Jackson’s CV
text:
(986)-231-8344 | lukej28@byui.edu | LinkedIn


August 2022 - December 2026
Bachelor of Science in Economics, Minor in Data Science
Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg Idaho
GPA: 3.9
Relevant coursework: Microeconomics, Macroeconomics, Statistics for Economists, Business Analytics, Financial Accounting, Introduction to Excel, Programming with Functions, Data Science Programming, Programming with Databases, and Inquiry and Innovation.





International Services BYU-I, Rexburg Idaho
October 2023 - Present
- Gained communication skills by interacting with students from nearly 100 different countries regarding visa regulations.
- Applied in-depth information to complicated individual circumstances.
- Understood legal literature about policy created by government organizations.



Vantage Marketing Co, Toronto ON
May 2023 - August 2023
- Demonstrated honesty with customers by maintaining the lowest cancellation rate in the office at 4%.
- Ranked top 3 among rookies, demonstrating hard work and commitment.
- Managed a self-directed working environment leading to enhanced discipline.



Vulcan County, Champion AB
April 2020 - August 2020
- Paid attention to detail even after long hours of work.
- Fixed 5 different pieces of equipment to help work move more efficiently, receiving a salary raise after 1 month.



Champion Swimming Pool, Champion AB
July 2017 - August 2020
- Directed team trainings on ever-changing safety protocols.
- Taught over 100 students of various ages the fundamentals of water safety.
- Performed in high-stress situations during and in prevention of rescues.






The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, Toronto ON
August 2020 - August 2022
- Led two different groups of 20+ volunteers to boost productivity by over 50% in 5 months.
- Conducted one-on-one training with new volunteers to implement effective strategies.
- Led and prepared training for groups ranging from 12-200 volunteers to increase overall effectiveness, productivity, and group accountability.



Canada Toronto Mission, Toronto ON
July 2021 - April 2022
- Conducted research and statistical analysis to increase reach by 400% in six months.
- Managed a Facebook page with a $40,000 annual advertising budget.
- Led team meetings, performed training, and managed communication with followers.





Excel
Python
Power BI
Data Analysis and Application
Statistics and Databases
Professional Writing
Interpersonal Intelligence
